Method Detail

runThisLidaTask

public void runThisLidaTask()
Description copied from class: LidaTaskImpl
To be overridden by child classes. Overriding method should execute a handful of statements considered to constitute a single iteration of the task. For example, a codelet might look in a buffer for some representation and make a change to it in a single iteration.
